title: 'Good News is Good News' Territory
description:
This week, Emily Peck, Felix Salmon, and Anna Szymanski discuss the advertising boycott of Facebook, environmental, social, and governance investing, and the implications of the latest jobs report. 

In the Slate Plus segment: Netflix.

Email: slatemoney@slate.com
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli.

Twitter: @felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @EmilyRPeck

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
